data.comment: The big names in today's match at Morumbí have now been confirmed.
The match is underway in Sao Paulo.
In the minute 1, Rodrigo Carvalhaes de Miranda signals a Bahia throw-in in Sao Paulo's half.
Throw-in for Sao Paulo at Morumbí.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 3, Throw-in Bahia.
Rodrigo Carvalhaes de Miranda awards the home team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Sao Paulo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 4, Rodrigo Carvalhaes de Miranda signals a free kick to Bahia in their own half.
Sao Paulo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sao Paulo push forward at Morumbí and Pablo Felipe gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Bahia defence.
In the minute 5, Corner awarded to Sao Paulo.
Sao Paulo's Pablo Felipe misses with an attempt on goal.
Rodrigo Carvalhaes de Miranda awards Bahia a goal kick.
In the minute 6, Igor Gomes (Sao Paulo) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Sao Paulo have a dangerous throw-in.
Bahia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 8, Sao Paulo's Pablo Felipe has run offside.
Free kick for Sao Paulo in their own half.
Sao Paulo drives forward and Reinaldo gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 10, Gilberto for Bahia is whistled offside.
Bahia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Bahia goal kick.
In the minute 13, Rodrigo Carvalhaes de Miranda signals a free kick to Bahia in their own half.
Bahia's Rodriguinho is on target but unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Sao Paulo in their own half.
In the minute 17, An attacking Bahia player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
Rodrigo Carvalhaes de Miranda awards Bahia a penalty but Gilberto misses from 12 yards.
In Sao Paulo Bahia drive forward through Gilberto. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 19, Bahia have been awarded a corner by Rodrigo Carvalhaes de Miranda.
Free kick for Sao Paulo in their own half.
Rodrigo Carvalhaes de Miranda signals a free kick to Sao Paulo in their own half.
In the minute 20, Throw-in Bahia.
Rodrigo Carvalhaes de Miranda awards the home team a throw-in.
Goal! Rossi gives Bahia a 0-1 lead in Sao Paulo.
In the minute 21, Rodriguinho with an assist there.
Bahia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sao Paulo have a goal kick.
In the minute 25, Goal kick for Bahia at Morumbí.
In Sao Paulo a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Sao Paulo drive upfield and Tche Tche gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Bahia defender.
In the minute 28, Corner awarded to Sao Paulo.
Sao Paulo's Vitor Bueno gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sao Paulo.
In the minute 30, Vitor Bueno (Sao Paulo) has received a first yellow card.
Free kick for Bahia in their own half.
In the minute 31, Bahia’s Rossi is on his feet again at Morumbí.
Goal kick for Sao Paulo at Morumbí.
The match at Morumbí has been interrupted briefly for a check on Rossi, who is down injured.
Rodrigo Carvalhaes de Miranda signals a free kick to Sao Paulo in their own half.
In the minute 33, Free kick for Sao Paulo in the half of Bahia.
Sao Paulo's Pablo Felipe attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Rodrigo Carvalhaes de Miranda awards Bahia a goal kick.
In the minute 35, Sao Paulo are pushing forward but Pablo Felipe's finish is wide of the goal.
Bahia have a goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Bahia goal kick.
In the minute 38, Ball safe as Bahia is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Sao Paulo to take a throw-in in Bahia territory.
Sao Paulo are coming forward and Reinaldo gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 40, It's a goal kick for the away team in Sao Paulo.
Bahia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Bahia at Morumbí.
In the minute 41, Throw-in for Sao Paulo in the half of Bahia.
Can Sao Paulo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bahia's half?
Free kick for Bahia in their own half.
In the minute 42, Rodrigo Carvalhaes de Miranda signals a free kick to Sao Paulo in their own half.
Important block from the Bahia defence as Igor Gomes fires in a strike for Sao Paulo.
Sao Paulo's Reinaldo gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Bahia defender.
In the minute 43, Free kick Bahia.
Sao Paulo to take a throw-in in Bahia territory.
Sao Paulo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 45, 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Sao Paulo.
Throw-in for Sao Paulo in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Sao Paulo in Sao Paulo.
In the minute 45, Sao Paulo surge into the attack at Morumbí but Vitor Bueno’s header is off-target.
Rodrigo Carvalhaes de Miranda awards Bahia a goal kick.
The first-half is over.
In the minute 46, The second-half has just kicked-off.
Sao Paulo needs to be cautious. Bahia have an attacking throw-in.
The home team replace Igor Gomes with Luciano.
In the minute 47, Ball goes out of play for a Sao Paulo goal kick.
Can Bahia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sao Paulo's half?
Pablo Felipe of Sao Paulo gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 49, It's a goal kick for the away team in Sao Paulo.
Liziero for Sao Paulo drives towards goal at Morumbí. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Rodrigo Carvalhaes de Miranda signals a free kick to Sao Paulo.
In the minute 51, Bahia will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Sao Paulo.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Sao Paulo drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 54, Sao Paulo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Bahia close to the penalty box.
Ball safe as Bahia is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 56, Gilberto gets his shot on target but fails to score for Bahia.
Bahia have been awarded a corner by Rodrigo Carvalhaes de Miranda.
Elber of Bahia gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 56, Sao Paulo have a goal kick.
In Sao Paulo Sao Paulo attack through Liziero. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Bahia at Morumbí.
In the minute 58, Throw-in for Sao Paulo in the half of Bahia.
Throw-in Bahia.
Can Sao Paulo capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Bahia's half?
In the minute 60, Throw-in for Bahia in their own half.
Sao Paulo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sao Paulo make their second substitution with Gabriel replacing Liziero.
In the minute 60, Gregore is booked for the away team.
Rodrigo Carvalhaes de Miranda awards the away team a throw-in.
Sao Paulo's Reinaldo gets in a shot on goal at Morumbí. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 64, Sao Paulo have been awarded a corner by Rodrigo Carvalhaes de Miranda.
Rodrigo Carvalhaes de Miranda signals a throw-in for Sao Paulo, close to Bahia's area.
Daniel is on a sub for Rodriguinho for Bahia.
In the minute 65, Can Sao Paulo capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Bahia's half?
Robert Arboleda of Sao Paulo smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Douglas Friedrich.
In the minute 67, Bahia's Douglas Friedrich is back in action after a slight knock.
Rodrigo Carvalhaes de Miranda waits before resuming play because Douglas Friedrich for Bahia is still down.
The away team has substituted Douglas Friedrich with Anderson. Roger Machado is thus making his second change.
In the minute 70, Ball goes out of play for a Bahia goal kick.
Sao Paulo pushes forward through Vitor Bueno, whose finish on goal is saved.
Corner awarded to Sao Paulo.
In the minute 71, Free kick for Sao Paulo in their own half.
In Sao Paulo, Vitor Bueno of Sao Paulo is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Throw-in high up the field for Sao Paulo in Sao Paulo.
In the minute 73, Saldanha is replacing Gilberto for the away team.
In the minute 74, Rodrigo Carvalhaes de Miranda signals a free kick to Bahia in their own half.
The away team replace Gregore with Alesson.
Elton is on a sub for Rossi for Bahia.
Elber for Bahia drives towards goal at Morumbí. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Helinho is replacing Tche Tche for Sao Paulo at Morumbí.
Corner awarded to Bahia.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sao Paulo.
In the minute 76, Fernando Diniz (Sao Paulo) is making a fourth substitution, with Gonzalo Carneiro replacing Igor Vinicius.
In the minute 77, Free kick for Bahia in their own half.
Throw-in for Sao Paulo at Morumbí.
Sao Paulo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 79, Rodrigo Carvalhaes de Miranda signals a Bahia throw-in in Sao Paulo's half.
Throw-in for Bahia close to the penalty box.
Sao Paulo have a goal kick.
In the minute 80, Vitor Bueno's header is off-target for Sao Paulo.
Goal kick for Bahia at Morumbí.
Rodrigo Carvalhaes de Miranda awards Bahia a goal kick.
In the minute 82, Bahia needs to be cautious. Sao Paulo have an attacking throw-in.
The home team have replaced Bruno Alves with Leo Pele. This is the fifth substitution made today by Fernando Diniz.
Sao Paulo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 85, Sao Paulo have been awarded a corner by Rodrigo Carvalhaes de Miranda.
Luciano (Sao Paulo) levels the match at 1-1 with a header.
Gonzalo Carneiro instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 86, Free kick Sao Paulo.
Sao Paulo's Pablo Felipe breaks free at Morumbí. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Rodrigo Carvalhaes de Miranda awards Bahia a goal kick.
In the minute 87, Free kick for Sao Paulo in the half of Bahia.
Sao Paulo's Pablo Felipe is whistled for offside at Morumbí.
Sao Paulo to take a throw-in in Bahia territory.
In the minute 89, Can Sao Paulo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bahia's half?
In Sao Paulo a free kick has been awarded the away team.
At Morumbí the fourth official shows that 7 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Bahia are pushing forward but Saldanha's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Sao Paulo at Morumbí.
Bahia's Alesson breaks free at Morumbí. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Sao Paulo goal kick.
In Sao Paulo Sao Paulo attack through Luciano. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sao Paulo.
Bahia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Rodrigo Carvalhaes de Miranda awards the home team a throw-in.
Rodrigo Carvalhaes de Miranda signals a free kick to Sao Paulo in their own half.
Bahia have a goal kick.
Rodrigo Carvalhaes de Miranda signals a free kick to Bahia.
Bahia have been awarded a corner by Rodrigo Carvalhaes de Miranda.
In Sao Paulo, Elber of Bahia is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Bahia.
Free kick for Sao Paulo in their own half.
Bahia have been awarded a corner by Rodrigo Carvalhaes de Miranda.
8 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Sao Paulo have a dangerous throw-in.
The match is over. Final score 1-1.
Gabriel (Sao Paulo) gets a yellow card.
Zeca (Bahia) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
